description: This header defines the interface for the DobbyContainer management within the WPEFramework plugin system, including methods for managing container lifecycle, querying status, and handling events related to container state changes.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Provides an interface for interacting with Dobby containers, including lifecycle management and event handling within the WPEFramework plugin ecosystem.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources used by the DobbyInterface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of current containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed info about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Gets the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby-specific specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a container, optionally forcing termination.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with provided options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation (key-value) to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes a specific annotation from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source to a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem from a container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Event handler called when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Event handler called when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Event handler for changes in container state.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Event handler invoked when verification fails.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
